name: Massive Effect
description: Space shooter with multiple game modes. Destroy enemies, get experience and increase your level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP,7,8,10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any (256 mb+) Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Potato
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP,7,8,10 Processor: Any Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any
